name: Lux Accommodations
tag_list: vacation-rentals, gds, transportation, rest, bed-and-breakfast, villa, apartments, startups, rentals
description: Make It Private. Make it Luxury.
overview: Lux Accommodations, based in La Jolla, CA, represents over 2300 corporate rental homes, apart’hotels, flats, villas and luxury listings throughout 6 countries, and connects travelers seeking alternatives to hotels to the property it manages for booking. Lux Accommodations is a subsidiary of LUX, based in Dubai, which is a private investment group which maintains a portfolio of hotels and multifamily properties globally.
